summary: I AM THE OWNER OF A 2013 FORD EDGE. THE DRIVER DOOR AJAR LIGHT KEEPS COMING ON WHEN THE DOOR IS SECURELY SHUT. THE INTERIOR LIGHTS REMAIN LIT AND DOORS WILL NOT LOCK. SOMETIMES IT WILL GO OFF AFTER REPEATEDLY SLAMMING THE DOOR SHUT BUT NOT ALWAYS. I FEEL THIS IS A DANGER BECAUSE OF DRIVING AT NIGHT WITH THE LIGHT ON. I ALSO HAVE CHILDREN IN THE CAR THAT COULD POSSIBLY OPEN THE DOOR WHILE THE CAR IS GOING.
